alert.note: Alert for Scott (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rock Island, northwestern Henry and southeastern Scott Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1115 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rock Island, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Davenport, Moline, Rock Island, Bettendorf, East Moline, Silvis, Colona, Milan, Le Claire, Coal Valley, Hampton, Port Byron, Buffalo, Rapids City, Riverdale, Cleveland, Dayton, Carbon Cliff, Panorama Park, and Silvis Heights. This includes the following highways... Interstate 74 in Iowa between mile markers 2 and 5. Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 303 and 306. Interstate 80 in Illinois between mile markers 1 and 10. Interstate 74 in Illinois between mile markers 1 and 14. Interstate 88 near mile marker 1. Interstate 280 between mile markers 4 and 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
